verses.verse: And the <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> and I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> to the <S%G1093>earth:<s%> and to him was <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> <S%G5421>pit.<s%>

And he <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> <S%G5421>pit;<s%> and there <S%G305>arose<s%> a <S%G2586>smoke<s%> out of the <S%G5421>pit,<s%> as the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2575>furnace;<s%> and the <S%G2246>sun<s%> and the <S%G109>air<s%> were <S%G4654>darkened<s%> by <S%G1537>reason<s%> of the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of the <S%G5421>pit.<s%>

And there <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G200>locusts<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth:<s%> and to them was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1849>power,<s%> as the <S%G4651>scorpions<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power.<s%>

And it was <S%G4483>commanded<s%> them that they should not <S%G91>hurt<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> neither <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G5515>green<s%> thing, neither <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1186>tree;<s%> but <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> not the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in their <S%G3359>foreheads.<s%>

And to them it was <S%G1325>given<s%> that they should not <S%G615>kill<s%> them, but that they should be <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months:<s%> and their <S%G929>torment<s%> was as the <S%G929>torment<s%> of a <S%G4651>scorpion,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G3817>strikes<s%> a <S%G444>man.<s%>

And in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> shall <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> and shall not <S%G2147>find<s%> it; and shall <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G599>die,<s%> and <S%G2288>death<s%> shall <S%G5343>flee<s%> from them.

And the <S%G3667>shapes<s%> of the <S%G200>locusts<s%> were <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> to <S%G4171>battle;<s%> and <S%G1909>on<s%> their <S%G2776>heads<s%> were as it were <S%G4735>crowns<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G5557>gold,<s%> and their <S%G4383>faces<s%> were as the <S%G4383>faces<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>
And they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2359>hair<s%> as the <S%G2359>hair<s%> of <S%G1135>women,<s%> and their <S%G3599>teeth<s%> were as the teeth of <S%G3023>lions.<s%>

And they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates,<s%> as it were <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> of <S%G4603>iron;<s%> and the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of their <S%G4420>wings<s%> was as the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G716>chariots<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G5143>running<s%> to <S%G4171>battle.<s%>

And they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G4651>scorpions,<s%> and there were <S%G2759>stings<s%> in their <S%G3769>tails:<s%> and their <S%G1849>power<s%> was to <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

And they <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them, which is the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> pit, <S%G846>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> in the <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> <S%G1447>tongue<s%> is <S%G3>Abaddon,<s%> but in the <S%G1673>Greek<s%> tongue <S%G2192>has<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G623>Apollyon.<s%>
<S%G3391>One<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> is <S%G565>past;<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3759>woes<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G3326>hereafter.<s%> <S%G5023><s%>

And the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> from the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> of the <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying<s%> to the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G4536>trumpet,<s%> <S%G3089>Loose<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1210>bound<s%> in the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G2166>Euphrates.<s%>

And the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G3089>loosed,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for an <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and a <S%G2250>day,<s%> and a <S%G3376>month,<s%> and a <S%G1763>year,<s%> for to <S%G615>slay<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> part of <S%G444>men.<s%>

And the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G4753>army<s%> of the <S%G2461>horsemen<s%> were <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3461>hundred<s%> <S%G3461>thousand<s%> <S%G3461>thousand:<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of them.

And <S%G3779>thus<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G2462>horses<s%> in the <S%G3706>vision,<s%> and them that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> them, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> of <S%G4447>fire,<s%> and of <S%G5191>jacinth,<s%> and <S%G2306>brimstone:<s%> and the <S%G2776>heads<s%> of the <S%G2462>horses<s%> were as the <S%G2776>heads<s%> of <S%G3023>lions;<s%> and out of their <S%G4750>mouths<s%> <S%G1607>issued<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> and <S%G2586>smoke<s%> and <S%G2303>brimstone.<s%>

By <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> was the <S%G5154>third<s%> part of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G615>killed,<s%> by the <S%G4442>fire,<s%> and by the <S%G2586>smoke,<s%> and by the <S%G2303>brimstone,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1607>issued<s%> out of their <S%G4750>mouths.<s%>

For their <S%G1849>power<s%> is in their <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> and in their <S%G3769>tails:<s%> for their <S%G3769>tails<s%> were <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G3789>serpents,<s%> and <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2776>heads,<s%> and with them they do <S%G91>hurt.<s%>

And the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> were not <S%G615>killed<s%> by <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%> yet <S%G3340>repented<s%> not of the <S%G2041>works<s%> of their <S%G5495>hands,<s%> that they should not <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1140>devils,<s%> and <S%G1497>idols<s%> of <S%G5552>gold,<s%> and <S%G693>silver,<s%> and <S%G5470>brass,<s%> and <S%G3035>stone,<s%> and of <S%G3585>wood:<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G991>see,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G4043>walk:<s%>

<S%G2532>Neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3340>repented<s%> they of their <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> of their <S%G5331>sorceries,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> of their <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> of their <S%G2809>thefts.<s%>
